page.title: 08Childrens' Games
page.content: I play rounders at my house with my friends. We use a bat and a ball. We use four big stones or four stumps for the bases.There are two teams. One to bat and one to field. There are two captains, one for each team. The feilders spread out for the ball to come. The baller throws the ball straight at the bat and the person who was batting hit the ball then ran round the bases. We play kick the can at nights. All you need is a can and some people to play. We say a rhyme for the person to be it. We say black shoe, black shoe please change your foot. You change your foot and say the rhyme again until someone's it. Then we say I draw a snake upon your back I half it I quarter it and dot it, which finger did I dot it with. Then they pick a
